item.title: Hello_world
item.description:
A blog for sharing useful snippets of knowledge I pickup as I work.

Hopefully some of it will be useful!

graph LR; A[I learn something]-->B[I write about it]-->C[You like it]-->E[I'm happy]-->G B-->D[You don't like it]-->F[I'm sad]-->G[You comment]
